content.raw:
* I'm afraid "grid width" might imply the length of the grid, rather than the number of cells, no? 
* I'm ok with changing to "Cell width". As a fererence, RViz uses "Cell Size", as you mentioned earlier.
* That can be useful if you want to have a notion of height. I noticed RViz has them connected, which might be clearer, but may also crowd the scene:

![rvizgrid.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2923609270-rvizgrid.png)
content.html:
• I'm afraid "grid width" might imply the length of the grid, rather than the number of cells, no?
  • I'm ok with changing to "Cell width". As a fererence, RViz uses "Cell Size", as you mentioned earlier.
  • That can be useful if you want to have a notion of height. I noticed RViz has them connected, which might be clearer, but may also crowd the scene:
